manifest_appDescription.message: Add some useful function for Web Developer

manifest_pageAction_executeCommands_Des.message: Open the options settings pop-up interface

options_allScope.message: In all domain enabled LL Developer Tools

options_otherScope.message: Only in the specified domain, enable LL Developer Tools

options_popupWinGlobeSwitch.message: Global disable show the HTTP response headers information Popup in the bottom of the page

options_saveXdebugIDEkeyError.message: Save your custom Xdebug Key error, please check your input

options_saveXdebugIDEkeySuccess.message: Save your custom Xdebug Key success

options_PopupRules_des.message: The default display all HTTP response header, You can specify some one to hide, one per line. You can NOT use regular.

options_xdebugModel_1.message: For all URLs Webpage Request (including Webpage internal JS, CSS, AJAX, post and so on request) to open Xdebug or Xhprof

options_xdebugModel_2.message: Only for the URL in the browser address bar to open Xdebug or Xhprof

options_xdebugModel_3.message: Only for the specified URLs request to open Xdebug or Xhprof

options_url.message: URL (can use a regular, or beginning with "http://" URL)

options_rules_descriptions.message: One URL per line, you can use a regular expression, but except ^$$ character.

message_deleteSelectedRule.message:
Delete the selected rule? 

The selected rule: ($1)

message_saveChangedValues.message: There is a change of configuration, have not been saved, do you want to save changes?

message_exitChangedValues.message: There is a change of configuration, have not been saved, whether to leave this page?

message_resetOptions.message: This will permanently delete all your configuration options, do you want to continue?

message_resetOptionsConfirm.message: Are you really sure you want to permanently delete all configuration, it will delete all of the configuration?

message_resetOptionsSuccess.message: The configuration option to clear success.

message_selectBackupFile.message: Select the path to backup file.

HTTP_Hearders_GetError.message: Gets the HTTP response header encountered an error, please refresh page.

HTTP_URL_GetError.message: Gets the current request URL error, please refresh page.
